nodes.text: The Emperor's Villa was a private retreat for Galactic Emperor Palpatine. It was located on the shores of the Great Western Sea on the planet Coruscant. Sitting partly out over the water, the villa was not as large as the Imperial Palace, but was still considered a large structure and had its own grounds. In 18 BBY it was the site of a failed attack by members of the Whiplash resistance movement.
